review.reviewBody: Best pizza - spicy chicken, Greek, cheese- not sure which is the best but love themall  so far!  Pizza is always hot fresh and delicious!
Bread stick is hard and burned very disappointing
Not good pizza at all breadsticks were like mini loafs of bread wjthbland flavour sadly   I threw it all out next morning
Best pizza ever that also comes with  amazing service and fast delivery . 5 star pizza place ðŸ’¯%.  ðŸ˜‹
